availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bourbon County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Ann Edwards Hill in Bourbon County, Kentucky, on February 25, 1836. Father of John W. Hill, James Hill, Frank G. Hill, and Sarah E. Hill. Married to Francis A. Ware Hill in Bourbon County on December 29, 1847. Father of Eliza Hill, James Hill, George A. Hill, and Francis Hill. Farmer in Bourbon County in 1850. Owned thirty-eight enslaved persons in Bourbon County in 1850. Farmer in Bourbon County in 1860. Owned fifty-two enslaved persons in Bourbon County in 1860.
